Caption: Mr. R. Natarajan (Registrar) and Prof. M. V. C. Sastri (Chemistry) in discussion during the high tea ceremony that was thrown in honour of Mr. Hans Lenzâ€™s (Minister for Scientific Research, Federal Republic of Germany) visit to IIT Madras
Description: Mr. Hans Lenz (Minister for Scientific Research, Federal Republic of Germany, Bonn) visited IIT Madras on 30th January, 1964. A high tea ceremony was thrown in honour of his visit to the campus. During the ceremony, Mr. Hans Lenz interacted with the dignitaries, administrative staff and faculty members present. In the image, a few of the dignitaries converse over refreshments: Mr. R. Natarajan, (right) and Prof. M. V. C. Sastri (left). The other individuals at the table are yet to be identified. Also seen in the background is Prof. R. A. Kraus Kraus (Adviser to the Government of India for IIT Madras).
